```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(ggplot2))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(stringr))

crash_data <- read_csv(here::here("dataset-ignore", "Crash_Reporting_-_Incidents_Data.csv"))

crash_data_clean <- crash_data |>   
  select(Latitude,
         Longitude, 
         "Driver Substance Abuse", 	
         "Non-Motorist Substance Abuse", 
         "At Fault",
         "Collision Type")
  
traffic_data_2 <- read_csv(here::here("dataset-ignore", "Traffic_Violations_20231103.csv")) 

traffic_data_2_clean <- traffic_data_2 |>   
  select("Date Of Stop", 
         "Time Of Stop", 
         Description, 
         Location, 
         Accident, 
         Fatal, 
         Alcohol, 
         "Violation Type", 
         Race, 
         Gender, 
         "Arrest Type",
         Latitude,
         Longitude) 
```
```{r}
crash_data_clean
traffic_data_2_clean
```


```{r}
crash <- crash_data_clean |>
  unite(Coordinates, c(Latitude, Longitude), sep = ",") |>
  rename(Driver_Substance_Abuse = "Driver Substance Abuse", Type = "Collision Type") |>
  select(Coordinates, Driver_Substance_Abuse, Type)

traffic <- traffic_data_2_clean |>
  unite(Coordinates, c(Latitude, Longitude), sep = ",") |>
  rename(Driver_Substance_Abuse = "Alcohol", Type = "Violation Type") |>
  select(Coordinates, Driver_Substance_Abuse, Type)
```

```{r}
combined <- union(crash, traffic)
combined
```
